H0.text: Which Lancashire football club plays home games at the Globe Arena, moving from Christie Park in 2010. Accrington Stanley

H1.text: Which Lancashire football club plays home games at the Globe Arena, moving from Christie Park in 2010. Blackburn Rovers

H2.text: Which Lancashire football club plays home games at the Globe Arena, moving from Christie Park in 2010. Blackpool FC

H3.text: Which Lancashire football club plays home games at the Globe Arena, moving from Christie Park in 2010. Morecambe

A4.text: Morecambe Football Club is a professional association football club based in Morecambe, Lancashire, England.

A5.text: On 10 August 2010, Morecambe played their first match at the Globe Arena against Championship side Coventry City in the League Cup.
